name: hungrily
content:
hungrily adverb
(NEEDING FOOD)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows you are hungry: They sat down and ate hungrily. The girls hungrily devoured their lunch.
More examplesFewer examplesThe campers chomped hungrily on organic tomatoes they had picked off the vine.I watched him as he hungrily bit into his handful of bread.The sergeant gnawed hungrily at his cheese roll.

(WANTING)
in a way that shows a strong wish or desire for something: He looked at her hungrily. The state's oil riches were being hungrily eyed by oil companies. See
